front.title: •Dannik Jerriko
front.gametext: Opponent's characters just lost from here may not be removed from Lost Pile (except to be placed out of play). While present at a site and armed with a blaster, adds one battle destiny. Cards hit by Dannik are power and forfeit -2.
front.lore: Anzati assassin. Cheek-folds hide proboscises which allow him to 'eat the soup' (consume the life Force) of his victims. Smokes t'bac. Currently working for Jabba.

rulings: Only prevents characters being removed from lost pile while they are in a 'just lost' state.
